Title: Exempts federal or state stimulus checks that are the result of a declared national or state disaster emergency from money judgments
Summary: Exempts any federal or state stimulus check that is the result of a declared national or state disaster emergency from money judgment; defines the term "stimulus check" shall mean any economic impact payment sent by the government to taxpayers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to exempting any federal or state stimulus check that is the result of a declared national or state disaster emergency from money judgments
